org.opendaylight.controller.md.statistics.manager

Interface StatNodeRegistration

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.util.EventListener, org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.NotificationListener, OpendaylightInventoryListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StatNodeRegistrationImpl

    public interface StatNodeRegistration
extends OpendaylightInventoryListener, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    statistics-manager org.opendaylight.controller.md.statistics.manager.impl StatNodeRegistration Class represents FlowCapableNode DataChangeListener in Operational/DataStore for ADD / REMOVE actions which are represented connect / disconnect OF actions. Connect functionality are expecting
    Author:
    Vaclav Demcak Created: Sep 5, 2014

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connectFlowCapableNode(org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<SwitchFeatures> keyIdent, SwitchFeatures data, org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<Node> nodeIdent)
      Method contains FlowCapableNode registration to StatisticsManager for permanently collecting statistics by StatPermCollector and as a prevention to use a validation check to the Operational/DS for identify connected FlowCapableNode.
